Posts.Content: lcfriedman wrote: Hi, I've had diagnostic mammo, ultrasound, core needle biopsy, and now open/excisional biopsy.  I am of course stressed out, but it's weird how it creeps up on me.  I am getting bitter about having several kids and it kind of being assumed by my husband that I should just not talk to them about this.  I wear my sports bra and a loose shirt and stuff an ice pack in there, and I'm off to carpools and errands and cleaning (since I am off work a couple days due to my job requiring physical work).  And then when I crumple and cry everyone is surprised. I feel like I need to go away and be by myself and walk on the beach or something.  anyone else feel this way?  I feel like I could deal with the stress if I could just have some time to myself. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: what to do while waiting/How to cope? lcfriedman Toulula
